entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent perms on some directories SDK writes into /tmp #26022
  • #18903 spelling is still not fixed #26021
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-30184 | .NET Information Disclosure Vulnerability #26010
  • Consider specifying ResolvableSdkPattern in MSBuild sdk resolvers' manifests. #26009

Closed

  • Getting error on checking vulnerable packages of solution with a shared project #26002
  • Cannot install dotnet-sdk-6.0 on Ubuntu 20.04 and 22.04 #26018
  • dotnet publish self-contained fail to find runtime identifier in command line when using web sdk #21116
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #26016
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #26013
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #26012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #26011
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Define SystemCollectionsImmutableVersion Versions.props #26007
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix the path detection logic for MSDeploy executable #25995
    Area-WebSDK
  • Move ILLink targets to the linker repo #25993
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/6.0.3xx] Update pre-release label to servicing #25641
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add --skip-sign-check option to repair, uninstall, and update #25834
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25999
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [24068] Remove Legacy -- behavior and use of UnparsedTokens #25854
    Area-Infrastructure
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure
  • test install-scripts #23812
    Area-Infrastructure
